title: Property List Filters
description: Filters that dynamically modify a property list when resolved. See Protocol Specification for semantic definitions of geographic and channel compliance.

countries_all.description: Property must be compliant for ad delivery to users in ALL listed countries (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2). 'Compliant' means: meets advertising regulations for that jurisdiction, can serve ads to users there, and has required consent mechanisms. Country refers to user location, not publisher headquarters or hosting. Required.

channels_any.description: Property must support ANY of the listed channels. 'Supports' means: can render the format, offers it for sale, and meets quality thresholds. Required.

property_types.description: Filter to these property types. Type is determined by the property's primary platform/medium.

feature_requirements.description: Feature-based requirements. Property must pass ALL requirements (AND logic).

exclude_identifiers.description: Identifiers to always exclude from results
